description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to strengthen the four science and technology faculties at UG through infrastructure, research and curricular improvements while building the basis for improved facilities management and future growth.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Article V. Section 5.01.(a), (b), (c) and (d) | Description :(a) The Subsidiary Agreement shall have beenexecuted; (b) establishment of PSC; (c) PC, proc. spec., assistant accountant shall have been hired; (d) adoption of theOperational Manual. | Due Date :15-Nov-2012

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2Section I.A.1.(a) | Description :Establish and maintain a Steering Committee with structure,functions and responsibilities satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2Section I.A.2.(a) | Description :Establish and maintain a core team: (i) headed by a PC (ii) assignedto the PU; and (iii) comprised of a procurement spec., financial spec., and assistant accountant. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2Section I.A.3.(a) | Description :The Recipient, through MOE, shall cause UG to establish andthereafter maintain a coordination and technical unit with structure, functions and responsibilities satisfactory to theAssociation. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2Section I.B.1.(a) | Description :The Recipient, through MOE, shall, and shall cause UG to adopt andthereafter carry out the Project in accordance with an Operational Manual acceptable to the Association. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2Section I.C.1 | Description :To facilitate the carrying out of the Project, the Recipient, throughMOE, shall enter into a Subsidiary Agreement with UG, under terms and conditions acceptable to the Association. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2Section I.D.1 | Description :The Recipient, through MOE, shall, and shall cause UG to, implement eachof the activities under Part A of the Project in accordance with: (a) EMP and (b) IPPF. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2Section I.D.2 | Description :The Recipient, through MOE, shall, and shall cause UG to, implement anyof the activities under Part B of the Project in accordancewith the EMP. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2Section I.D.3 | Description :The Recipient, through MOE, shall, and shall cause UG to ensure, thatthe TORs for any consultancies under Part C of the Project shall be satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :Yearly

title.narrative: Number of scientific research projects funded
PDO 3--Basis for improved growth: Studies produced by the Project are incorporated into the UG strategy

baseline.value: No Project financed studies incorporated into the UG strategy

target.value: All 4 studies are incorporated into the UG strategy

actual.value: The studies related to the Biodiversity Institute and Assessment of Existing Human Resources have been incorporated into the UGstrategy

title.narrative: Updated curricula in each of 4 science faculties

baseline.value: No updated curricula in the 4 science faculties

target.value: Revisions of Year 1, Year 2, Year 3 and Year 4 courses are approved by the Academic Board

actual.value: Program documents for the 15 identified programs completed

title.narrative: Facility management plan established and under implementation
Campus-wide rehabilitation of the drainage systems
Existence of a single, working UG connection to external networks
PDO 2--Basis for improved facilities management:Maintenance of buildings and equipment in 13 rehabilitated buildings and of ICT camp us-wide (ICT)
PDO 2--Basis for improved facilities management: Maintenance of buildings and equipment in 13 rehabilitated buildings and of ICT cam pus wide (Equipment)
PDO 2--Basis for improved facilities management: Maintenance of buildings and equipment in 13 rehabilitated buildings and of ICT cam pus-wide (Buildings)
PDO 4--Strengthen science and technology faculties: Number of reformed/strengthened Programs offered
PDO 1--Strengthen science and technology faculties: Number of research grants with at least one paper evaluated as successful

target.value: Survey conducted, Report published and Action Plan prepared

actual.value: Survey was launched in early November 2016 and results are expected in January 2017.
